# <code>split chars</code> for strings

<div class='command-title'>Split a string's characters into separate rows</div>

## Signature

```> split chars```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Split the string's characters into separate rows
```shell
  > 'hello' | split chars
```
